body_html:
I figured it out thanks to ls -ld, my exec_check_disable.h denies access for others.
Just sudo chmod o=r /usr/local/cuda/include/thrust/detail/config/exec_check_disable.h and it builds.

Thanks for pointing out girving.
body_text:
I figured it out thanks to ls -ld, my exec_check_disable.h denies access for others.
Just sudo chmod o=r /usr/local/cuda/include/thrust/detail/config/exec_check_disable.h and it builds.
Thanks for pointing out girving.
body:
I figured it out thanks to `ls -ld`, my exec_check_disable.h denies access for others.
Just `sudo chmod o=r /usr/local/cuda/include/thrust/detail/config/exec_check_disable.h` and it builds.

Thanks for pointing out girving.
